certifications.subtitle: Confederation of Indian Industry
certifications.title: Certified CII Supply Chain Management Executive

recommendations: Shefali Bhardwaj “Aayush has interned at Jumbotail twice, handling different projects in supply chain and business and each time he has been immensely appreciated for his dedication and hunger to learn more . His ability to take ownership of projects and driving them to excellence will undoubtedly take him a long way. It was great fun to have Aayush in our team and I am sure he will be one of the best talents wherever he chooses to go.”

Bhavya Mehta “I have known Aayush for over 3 years now. He is a hardworking and result oriented person. When it comes to executing an idea, Aayush is the one you want on your team. He is the one who eats last, a true leader by virtue. I would jump at any opportunity to work with him again. Wishing him best for his future endeavors.”

honors_and_awards.description: I got selected for the Global Engineer Leadership (GEL) scholarship offered as a part of my summer research internship at Entreprise logistics and E-Business centre (ELEBC), National Tsing Hua University, Taiwan. I am honored to get this scholarship along with 30 other fellow interns out of 1000+ applicants in the year 2017. Here is a link to know more about this scholarship:
